attributes.action: Make it so that food packaging says suitable for pregnant women on packaging.
attributes.additional_details: Similar to the vegetarian and halal description that goes on to food packaging. This would greatly help all pregnant women to make healthy choices throughout their pregnancies.
attributes.background: As a pregnant woman I'm very conscious of eating the right things to avoid illness that could harm my baby. Many items some obscure contain egg white and yolks which if pasteurised or cooked is fine but many items don't say. There for a simple p to show it is safe to eat while pregnant would help.

rejection.details: Your petition seems to be calling on food manufacturers to take this action. If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require manufacturers to do this, you could start a new petition calling for that.
